album

Class Collection

  • java.lang.Object
    • album.Collection

  • public class Collection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the array list data structure to hold the album collection and provide the operations to manage the collection
    Author:
    Jack Dunich, Kiana Perst

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Album[] albums
      album list
      private int numAlbums
      number of albums in collection

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Collection() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(Album album)
      Adds album to the array list if it does not already exist in array list
      private void albumStart()
      Initializes album
      private int find(Album album)
      Find the album index or -1 if the album is not in album array
      private void grow()
      Increase the capacity of the array list by 4
      private void inOrderDate()
      Orders the album list by Date
      private void inOrderGenre()
      Orders the album list by Genre
      boolean lendingOut(Album album)
      Set to not available
      void print()
      Display the list without specifying the order
      void printByGenre()
      Prints by genre
      void printByReleaseDate()
      Prints by release date

      Removes album and keeps the same order if the album exists in array list

      • add

        public boolean add(Album album)
        Adds album to the array list if it does not already exist in array list
        Parameters:
        album - object
        Returns:
        true if the album is added, false if the album already exists in the list

      • albumStart

        private void albumStart()
        Initializes album

      • find

        private int find(Album album)
        Find the album index or -1 if the album is not in album array
        Parameters:
        album - object
        Returns:
        int index or -1 if not found

      • grow

        private void grow()
        Increase the capacity of the array list by 4

        Orders the album list by Date

        Orders the album list by Genre

      • lendingOut

        public boolean lendingOut(Album album)
        Set to not available
        Parameters:
        album - object
        Returns:
        true if the getAvailable field is changed to false, false if it is not in the list or the field is already false

      • print

        public void print()
        Display the list without specifying the order

      • printByGenre

        Prints by genre

      • printByReleaseDate

        public void printByReleaseDate()
        Prints by release date

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Album album)
        Removes album and keeps the same order if the album exists in array list
        Parameters:
        album - object
        Returns:
        true if the album is removed, and false if the album is not in the list

      • returnAlbum

        public boolean returnAlbum(Album album)
        Set to available
        Parameters:
        album - object
        Returns:
        true if the getAvailable field is changed to true, false if it is not in the list or the field is already true
